insider.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who has a special knowledge of a particular organization because they are part of it

insider.translation[1].definitions[0].de: someone who works for a company or an organization and so has information about it that is not available to other people
insider.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Company insiders have expressed their reservations about the deal.
